alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Grand Forks; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 6:10PM CDT until June 24 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Norman County in northwestern Minnesota... Southwestern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... Traill County in southeastern North Dakota... Northeastern Barnes County in southeastern North Dakota... Steele County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 608 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Merrifield to 6 miles southeast of Cooperstown, moving southeast at 25 mph. At 600 PM CDT, a 54 mph gust was reported 6 miles southeast of Kempton prior to the arrival of thunderstorms. Additionally, high winds are creating blowing dust and leading to significantly reduced visibility. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Merrifield and Grand Forks around 615 PM CDT. Thompson around 620 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Blabon, Bygland and Hope. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 99 and 136. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Cass; Grand Forks; Steele; Traill
